document_data.name: Clan Horndragon
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Horndragon''' was an extinct [[dragonheir]] clan of the [[Sword Lands]] of [[Laerakond]].
document_data.History:
Clan Horndragon was one of the oldest clans of Laerakond. Its members were descendants of the first [[human]] roostmasters of the [[primordial]]s, who lived millennia before the [[Spellplague]].

In the late years of the 15th century [[DR]] clan Horndragon was considered by most to have been completely wiped out by their enemies of old, the [[dragons]].
